original_text: For true and righteous are his judgments: for he hath judged the great whore, which did corrupt the earth with her fornication, and hath avenged the blood of his servants at her hand.
korean_text: 그의 심판은 참되고 의로운지라 음행으로 땅을 더럽게 한 큰 음녀를 심판하사 자기 종들의 피를 그 음녀의 손에 갚으셨도다 하고

sentences.original_text: For true and righteous are his judgments:
for he hath judged the great whore,
which did corrupt the earth with her fornication,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 음녀는 자기의 음행으로 땅을 더럽혔고

sentences.original_text: and hath avenged the blood of his servants
